name: Health Grabber
description:
This is my submission for the ScoreSpace x Ultimate Arcade game jam.

Download the game for a better experience.

This game throws you into an arena where your health is decaying along with the enemies that are in there with you. Your goal is to steal the enemies health and take it for yourself trying to survive as long as you can beating all your friends and everyone else on the global leaderboard.

Hope you have fun playing it, I will continue to fine tune the game once the game jam is complete and update the game.

Thanks for playing.
